??? edu.ncsu.csc.itrust.risk.factors

  • ??? 
    ? ??
    AgeFactor
    The risk factor associated with checking if a person is over a particular age See PatientRiskFactor for details on what each method typically does.
    ChildhoodInfectionFactor
    Checks if the patient had the given diagnoses during childhood.
    CholesterolFactor
    Checks if cholesterol is over a given threshold for a given patient See PatientRiskFactor for details on what each method typically does.
    EthnicityFactor
    Checks if the ethnicity of a patient matches the one at risk See PatientRiskFactor for details on what each method typically does.
    FamilyHistoryFactor
    Checks if a patient has a family history of a given diagnosis range.
    GenderFactor
    Checks if the patient's gender matches the given at-risk one.
    HypertensionFactor
    Checks if the patient's blood pressure is above a given threshold.
    PatientRiskFactor
    Abstract class for risk factors, the hasRiskFactor delegates to the protected version.
    PriorDiagnosisFactor
    Checks for prior diagnoses by delegatin to the DAO See PatientRiskFactor for details on what each method typically does.
    SmokingFactor
    Risk factor delegates to the DAO to see if a patient has ever smoked in their life See PatientRiskFactor for details on what each method typically does.
    WeightFactor
    Checks the patient's body mass index over the given threshold See PatientRiskFactor for details on what each method typically does.
